review: Great addition to any TV or perfect for the cord cutter. I've dropped cable and replaced our entertainment options with this and it's great. We have multiple of these connected to all the TV's in the house. The FireTV plus the great shows on Prime and the option for Netflix, Sling TV, and other  services is the future for sure. This is a much better option than the Google Chromecast.
author: Chris Corriveau

review: You cannot rent and view most of the movies you have to puchase them.  If I would of known that I would have not purchased the Fire TV stick.
author: Juana Gutierrrez

review: Working good so far slow shipping because of back orders.Hook up was easy didn't like it didn't have my vudu app.otherwise good product.
author: westley smith

review: Love this item. It runs smoothly and fast. Will buy a couple for family.
author: Lashanda Collins

review: Liked how easy it was to set up.  bought as a gift and didn't like the fact it was automatically set up attached to my account.  I got it for the wife so it wasn't a problem, but as a gift it would be.
author: James Dennis
